mapper.select: select distinct sm.id,sm.permission, sm.name, sm.parent_id as parentId from sys_role_menu srm,sys_menu sm where sm.is_show='N' and srm.menu_id=sm.id and srm.role_id=#{id}

select distinct sm.id,sm.parent_id as parentId,sm.name,sm.target,sm.permission,sm.sort,sm.href
from sys_menu sm,sys_role_menu srm,sys_user_role sur where sur.role_id=srm.role_id and srm.menu_id=sm.id and sm.menu_type='menu' and sm.del_flag='N' and sm.is_show='Y' and sur.user_id = #{userId}# order by sm.sort
